title: Me need HoeflerText
content:
Hi,

I need to view a EPS with the font HoeflerText.  
Does anyone know where I can get it for free.  
Only need to view the text, its a logo that I want to convert from EPS -\> JPG.

Thx  
Christoffer

 [‹ Looking for a font for my website..](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064512/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17204 "Go to previous forum topic") [Willi Kunz Typography Books ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064512/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17178 "Go to next forum topic")
author: crz

comments.content: You can “get it for free” on any Mac running OS X.
This is probably the last place you want to ask for someone to give you a not-for-free font for a job.

Christoffer,  
I am sure you don’t like to work for free or even worse, to have someone else give your work away for free without even asking you?

You might contact the foundry and ask for a sample GIF or JPG. They might even help you out.

ChrisL

Only need to view the text, it’s a logo that I want to convert from EPS -\> JPG.

Contact the person you received this logo from, ask him/her to convert the text to outlines and resend you the file.

Man, this must be the lamest excuse _ever_ for asking for a pirated copy of a font. BTW There is a very strict policy regarding this on Typophile — you can consider yourself lucky you didn’t get kicked off the Forum yet.
